From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He heard gun shots, and ducked. His armor was burnt in a few places.
"What the...?!" He looked up to see the bots.
"You would fire, on a Alliance ally? I'll Terminate you!"
He returned fire, with plasma charges.
